body:
Myself(Sayah/Dustahh) and WQMBAT(Junr) have decided to make a dual ama.

@Junr: ask Junr/WQMBAT
@Dustahh: ask me
@Both: asks both

Shoot away!

title: Dual AMA-WQMBAT and WQMBATJr

replies.body:
@Both 

Can I have your souls?

What is the meaning of life?

What would you do if you had a tank?

Would you prefer pleasure before death or death before pleasure? (This is a trick question)

Why did you guys decide to change your names this way? XD

WHAT ARE YOU DOIN', DONKEY!?

Enjoying the party? Muaeheheheh...

replies.body:
Heya guys, wow it's been a while since I've seen a dual AMA, especially when the names are well... yeah.
@both
Questions...

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on?
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus?
  4. Why?
  5. Worst injury you have had?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. List someone and describe them in 5 words! :P
  8. What is your current impression of me?
Hope you're having a great summer and see you in game! :D 

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
1. Are you wearing socks right now? Nope
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on? Coffee and shoes 
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus? The dictionary
  4. Why? Idk
  5. Worst injury you have had? I got hit with a surfboard once in the face and got a scar
  6. What kind of music do you listen to? Rap, and sometimes EDM.
  7. List someone and describe them in 5 words! :P Snow: My long lost older brother
  8. What is your current impression of me? I like you, you're a good friend. Sometimes you don't look legit at all, but oh well, other times you do. You're a good guy.

replies.body: Ah, I used to hate your guts. I think since then we've both matured and we've left that incident apart(I think, me at least). You're a good player, and a good team leader.

replies.body: Well, I have certainly been much more popular in the last 5 months, and I had ref back then already, but I think it is because I have gotten into the community much more and have talked to a lot of people. So I don't think it has to do with the fact that I'm a Ref, but with the fact that I interact with the community a lot.

So I don't think it has to do with the fact that I'm a Ref, but with the fact that I interact with the community a lot.
